channel.title: My first siggy vote on it please

item.title: My first siggy vote on it please
item.dc:creator: @kaza Kaza
item.description:
@kaza wrote:

[quote=".Flair (LegendaryLoser), post:8, topic:80625"][quote author=Kaza link=topic=118430.msg1163829#msg1163829 date=1176683713]

I think that’s a little harsh, but it’s true it’s just two brushes with some effects and gradients

4/10

How could it be harsh? It’s shite, and i mean shite, he really hasn’t done any thing well. I mean, my first one sucked, and i got harsh comments, but it helps you become better, instead of saying, Ooo since it’s your first one you get a cookie, well done, they will carry on being shit, but if your harsh, they will try and improve on what you have said, they will try and do better and get a better comment.

Adding a render, go to www.gamerenders.com or www.planetrenders.net and get a render that you think looks good, copy it, paste it into your picture, grab the magic wand tool and delete the background off it, and resize and then you’ve got ya render.
[/quote]
I know that, I said that in a comment a few days ago

I’m just saying 2/10 is still pretty low for a first[/quote]

It doesn’t matter if it was a first, if it was his 87th it still would suck as much!

Read full topic
item.source: My first siggy vote on it please
